message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for this item, which is the maximum I can afford. What do you think?
Hi Bob, I understand your position.  How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $15,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm really only able to go up to $13,000. This would be a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can close the deal.
